code: import openFOI from'./openFOI';const allPortfolioPosts=[openFOI];const sortedPortfolioPosts=[...allPortfolioPosts].sort((a,b)=>new Date(b.date).getTime()-new Date(a.date).getTime());export const getRecentPortfolioPosts=function(){let count=arguments.length>0&&arguments[0]!==undefined?arguments[0]:3;return sortedPortfolioPosts.slice(0,count);};export const getPortfolioPostById=id=>{return sortedPortfolioPosts.find(post=>post.id===id);};export default sortedPortfolioPosts;
